DOC.brief_summary: The Zenith®Fenestrated AAA Endovascular Graft Clinical Study clinical investigation approve US FDA study safety effectiveness Zenith® Fenestrated AAA Endovascular Graft treatment abdominal aortic aorto-iliac aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Zenith® Fenestrated Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm ( AAA ) Endovascular Graft Continued Access Study
DOC.criteria: Abdominal aortic aortoiliac aneurysm diameter great equal 5 cm Proximal neck le 4 mm great equal 15 mm length unless otherwise compromise preclude seal Renal artery stenosis great 50 percent
